properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 7:51PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall is expected over the next 24 to 48 hours and a flood warning is now in effect.
River levels are based on forecasted rainfall totals and river levels may change depending on
actual rainfall amounts...

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Friday afternoon until further notice...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  7:30 PM Wednesday the stage was 85.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 90.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 98.1 feet by Monday evening. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 98.0 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
